me_no_target: Flare if you wish, but that person isn't here to see it.
actor_self: $n flares his nostrils and huffs at himself.
actor_other: $n flares $s nostrils disdainfully at $N and turns up $s snobbish nose.
actor_me: $n flares $s nostrils disdainfully at you... what'd you DO???
me_actor: You flare your nostrils disdainfully at $N... HOW RUDE!
